StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthSummaryCmdGroup]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileID uniqueidentifier
AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT s.Name, s.Rank, s.CommandGroupMemberSignatureID, U1.FirstName CommandGroupMemberFirstName, U1.MiddleName CommandGroupMemberMiddleName, U1.LastName CommandGroupMemberLastName, s.CommandGroupMemberSignatureDate, s.COSignatureID, U2.FirstName COFirstName, U2.MiddleName COMiddleName, U2.LastName COMemberLastName, s.SentToDistrictDate FROM USMC.MonthSummary s JOIN USMC.Mul.MonthSummary AS mms ON mms.ID = s.Mul.MonthSummaryID LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[vwMcrissUserMgmtUser] AS U1 ON U1.UserID = s.CommandGroupMemberSignatureID LEFT OUTER JOIN [usmc].[vwMcrissUserMgmtUser] AS U2 ON U2.UserID = s.COSignatureID WHERE mms.TrainingFileId=@TrainingFileID Order by monthincrement
END
